title: The Folly of Princely Court, from "In Praise of Folly"

description: printed in black; stick figure dressed in king\'s regalia, accompanied by a partially clothed woman with large breasts, a knight and black robed and masked figures; animals in human dress, a knight with a cups as a head and a stick figure pope bow before king stick figure; received framed
